ability: 【C】 EXPERIENCE If the total Level of cards in your Level slot is 2 or higher, this card gets +500 Power and gains the following ability. 『【C】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 Power.』

name: カチューシャ 千石撫子
flavor_text: 人生の言うことは、絶対
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose 1 of your other 《怪異》 Character, during that turn, it gets +1000 Power.
【A】 ［②］ When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, draw 1 card.

name: 妹たちの助け人 羽川翼
flavor_text: そうだねー
ability: 【A】［②］ When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, search your Deck for up to 1 《怪異》 Character and show it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards.

name: 憑藻神 斧乃木余接
flavor_text:
鬼のお兄ちゃん。
あなたはよくよく不死身の怪異に縁があるようだね
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during that turn, this card gets +1500 Power.

name: “例外のほうが多い規則”斧乃木余接
flavor_text: 『例外のほうが多い規則』――僕はキメ顔でそう言った

name: 帰り道 羽川翼
flavor_text:
阿良々木くんは怠慢なんてしてないよ。
それは私がよく知ってる

name: 二人の遊び 千石撫子
flavor_text: じゃ、人生ゲームしようか、暦お兄ちゃん
ability: 【S】● ASSIST 3000 Level 2［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］ (Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during this turn, it gets +3000 Power)

name: 陰陽師 影縫余弦
flavor_text:
ちゅーか、許さんゆうて、
今のおどれに何ができるっちゅーねん
ability: 【S】［②］ Until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +2500 Power.

name: 敗者の強がり
flavor_text:
これから大逆転するところだったんだよ、余計な
世話を焼かないでくれるかな、お姉ちゃん――
ability: Look up to the top X card of your Deck, choose up to 2 card, add it to Hand. Place the remaining cards into Waiting Room. X is equals to the number of 《怪異》 Character.

name: 家族のこと
flavor_text: 他人じゃありません。家族です
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Book：When this card is triggered, you may draw 1 card)

name: 吸血鬼の絆 忍野忍
flavor_text: 吸血鬼の絆は魂の絆じゃと、散々教えてやったろう？

name: 正義の味方ごっこ 阿良々木火憐＆阿良々木月火
flavor_text:
『僕の誇り。僕の自慢の妹たち。偽物ゆえに、きっと
何よりも本物に近い彼女達。ファイヤーシスターズは
火のついた花火のような勢いで、出撃していったのだった』
ability: 【C】 If you have 2 or more other 《スポーツ》 or 《和服》 Character, this card gets +1500 Power.

name: “正義の味方”阿良々木火憐
flavor_text:
『上の妹。阿良々木火憐。中学三年生、
六月末に誕生日を迎えて一五歳――』
ability: 【C】 SUPPORT All your Character in front of this card gets +500 Power.

name: “正義そのもの”阿良々木月火
flavor_text:
『下の妹。阿良々木月火。中学二年生、
誕生日は四月の頭で、つまり現在一四歳――』
ability: 【S】● ASSIST 2000 Level 1［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］(Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during this turn, it gets +2000 Power.)
